summary:
Highly experienced electrical engineer developed over 10+ years within the automotive, microelectronics & supply chain industries - leading cross functional multiple engineering teams across multiple platforms & territories on complex, large scale strategic programme initiatives, problem-solving to improve individual and organizational performance. International experience in China, Russia, Kazakhstan, EMEA. 

STRENGTHS
-Electrical engineering & technical background in Automotive, Bitcoin mining
-Implementing and debugging electro-mechanical systems
-PCB layouts design, review, EMC
-Altium, Cadence, Solidworks CAD designs
-Application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC)
-Electrical power system design standards NERC, IEEE, NEC

-Participating in the selection of electrical system schemes for crypto mining construction and provide suggestions during the design process
-Participating in crypto mining facility construction, follow up the progress of mining, and assist in the installation /inspection /acceptance of electrical equipment
-Assisting in dealing with electrical malfunctions in operating crypto mining facilities and propose preventive (improvement) measures
-Diagnose and repair malfunctioning systems by using test equipment to identify and eliminate bugs within tight time frames
-Collecting information on Russian electrical equipment manufacturers and produce the documents for internal use by the company

-Managed repair shop based on mine including setting up a logistics chain for microelectronics delivery from China
-Organized training for repair and maintenance of machines on mine. More than 30 employers trained
